cta.description: Download Quicksilver today and discover a faster way to work.
cta.title: Ready to supercharge your Mac?

features.description: Quicksilver lets you start applications, manipulate files, and much more — all from your keyboard.

extensible.description: Hundreds of plugins extend Quicksilver's capabilities to work with your favorite apps.
extensible.title: Extensible

instantLaunch.description: Launch applications, open files, and access bookmarks with just a few keystrokes.
instantLaunch.title: Instant Launch

openSource.description: Free forever. Actively maintained by a passionate community of developers.
openSource.title: Open Source

powerfulActions.description: Move, copy, email, or compress files. Send messages. Control iTunes. The possibilities are endless.
powerfulActions.title: Powerful Actions

smartLearning.description: Quicksilver learns your habits and adapts to show you what you need, when you need it.
smartLearning.title: Smart Learning

features.title: Lightning Fast Productivity

triggers.description: Assign keyboard shortcuts or mouse gestures to instantly run any action.
triggers.title: Triggers

hero.description: Quicksilver is a fast macOS productivity application that gives you the power to control your Mac quickly and elegantly.

interfaces.description: Choose from multiple interfaces, styles and colors to fit your rhythm.
interfaces.footer: 10+ interfaces to choose from, with color theming built in!
interfaces.title: Multiple Interfaces tailored to you

plugins.description: Supercharge Quicksilver with plugins that integrate with your favorite apps and workflows.

browsers.description: Control Safari, Chrome, and Firefox. Search bookmarks and history.
browsers.title: Browsers

calculator.description: Perform calculations instantly and copy results to clipboard.
calculator.title: Calculator

calendar.description: Create events and reminders without leaving your keyboard.
calendar.title: Calendar & Reminders

clipboard.description: Access clipboard history and store items for quick access.
clipboard.title: Clipboard & Shelf

emojis.description: Search and insert emojis anywhere with a quick shortcut.
emojis.title: Emojis

images.description: Resize, crop, and convert images directly from Quicksilver.
images.title: Image Manipulation

mail.description: Send emails directly from Quicksilver with Apple Mail or Gmail.
mail.title: Mail

plugins.title: Infinitely Extend with Plugins
